name: Pepeg
description:
Pepeg - MVM #5
Explore the abandoned castle and unlock new abilities by finding souls of fallen adventurers.

Disclaimer! This game is incomplete, lacking of features and contains many bugs. Play with your own risk. Sorry for inconvenience.

Controls
- Move: Arrow keys 
- Jump: Z (Hold to jump higher)
- Melee: X
- Tab: Map
- Esc: Pause

Submission to the Metroidvania Month (#5) Game Jam

Credits 
- Mekyi
- RabbitTank
